Key Match Events: Brooks Lee had a breakout game with five RBIs, including a two-run, go-ahead single in the sixth inning and a three-run triple in the seventh.
Carlos Santana hit a two-run homer, his team-leading 22nd of the season.
Ryan Jeffers hit a two-out double to tie the game in the sixth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Brooks Lee expressed his hope to replicate his performance in the playoffs and emphasized the importance of the win to avoid a sweep.
Manager Rocco Baldelli highlighted the team's resilience and the importance of good plate appearances.
Ryan Jeffers mentioned the significance of momentum and resilience going into the next games.
Kyle Farmer emphasized the mindset of playing to take control rather than playing defensively.
